symptoms.name: Painful nodular lesions and abscesses
symptoms.pattern: Disseminated, can spread from initial site

symptoms.name: Ulcers
symptoms.pattern: Gray-white necrotic base with red edges, rapid progression

symptoms.name: Erythematous-violaceous skin
symptoms.pattern: Slightly desquamative, covering nodules and tumors

symptoms.name: Systemic symptoms (fever, weight loss, night sweats)

physical_findings: Nodules and subcutaneous tumors (up to 6 cm)

lab_values.stool examination: Negative for helminths and protozoa in some cases

imaging_findings.CT scan: No liver or intestinal abscesses in some cases

required: Clinical presentation of lesions (nodules, abscesses, ulcers)
Identification of Entamoeba histolytica trophozoites in lesion secretion or biopsy
supportive: Negative stool examination for other parasites
